member.summary: Additional content added by the person who shared this activity, applicable only when resharing an activity.

member.summary: Latitude and longitude where this activity occurred. Format is latitude followed by longitude, space separated.

member.summary: The ID of this activity.

member.summary: The time at which this activity was initially published. Formatted as an RFC 3339 timestamp.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Activity.Radius
member.summary: Radius, in meters, of the region where this activity occurred, centered at the latitude and longitude identified in geocode.

member.summary: This activity's verb, indicating what action was performed. Possible values are: - "post" - Publish content to the stream. - "checkin" - Check in to a location. - "share" - Reshare an activity.

member.summary: The object of this activity.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Activity.ObjectData.Actor
member.summary: If this activity's object is itself another activity (for example, when a person reshares an activity), this property specifies the original activity's actor.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Activity.ObjectData.Attachments
member.summary: The media objects attached to this activity.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Activity.ObjectData.Content
member.summary: The HTML-formatted content, suitable for display. When creating or updating an activity, this value must be supplied as plain text in the request. If successful, the response will contain the HTML-formatted content. When updating an activity, use originalContent as the starting value, then assign the updated text to this property.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Activity.ObjectData.Id
member.summary: The ID of the object. When resharing an activity, this is the ID of the activity being reshared.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Activity.ObjectData.ObjectType
member.summary: The type of the object. Possible values are: - "note" - Textual content. - "activity" - A Google+ activity.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Activity.ObjectData.OriginalContent
member.summary: The content (text) as provided by the author, stored without any HTML formatting. When updating an activity's content, use the value of originalContent as the starting point from which to make edits.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.Gender
member.summary: The person's gender. Possible values are: - "male" - Male gender. - "female" - Female gender. - "other" - Other.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.HasApp
member.summary: If "true", indicates that the person has installed the app that is making the request and has chosen to expose this install state to the caller. A value of "false" indicates that the install state cannot be determined (it is either not installed or the person has chosen to keep this information private).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.Id
member.summary: The ID of this person.

member.summary: The representation of the person's profile photo.

member.summary: The languages spoken by this person.

member.summary: An object representation of the individual components of a person's name.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.Nickname
member.summary: The nickname of this person.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.ObjectType
member.summary: Type of person within Google+. Possible values are: - "person" - represents an actual person. - "page" - represents a page.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.Organizations
member.summary: A list of current or past organizations with which this person is associated.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.PlacesLived
member.summary: A list of places where this person has lived.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.RelationshipStatus
member.summary: The person's relationship status. Possible values are: - "single" - Person is single. - "in_a_relationship" - Person is in a relationship. - "engaged" - Person is engaged. - "married" - Person is married. - "its_complicated" - The relationship is complicated. - "open_relationship" - Person is in an open relationship. - "widowed" - Person is widowed. - "in_domestic_partnership" - Person is in a domestic partnership. - "in_civil_union" - Person is in a civil union.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.Tagline
member.summary: The brief description (tagline) of this person.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.Url
member.summary: The URL of this person's profile.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.Urls
member.summary: A list of URLs for this person.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.EmailsData.Primary
member.summary: If "true", indicates this email address is the person's primary one.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.EmailsData.Type
member.summary: The type of address. Possible values are: - "home" - Home email address. - "work" - Work email address. - "other" - Other.

member.summary: The department within the organization.

member.summary: A short description of the person's role in this organization.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.OrganizationsData.Location
member.summary: The location of this organization.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.OrganizationsData.Name
member.summary: The name of the organization.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.OrganizationsData.Primary
member.summary: If "true", indicates this organization is the person's primary one (typically interpreted as current one).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.OrganizationsData.StartDate
member.summary: The date the person joined this organization.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.OrganizationsData.Title
member.summary: The person's job title or role within the organization.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.OrganizationsData.Type
member.summary: The type of organization. Possible values are: - "work" - Work. - "school" - School.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.PlacesLivedData.Primary
member.summary: If "true", this place of residence is this person's primary residence.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.PlacesLivedData.Value
member.summary: A place where this person has lived. For example: "Seattle, WA", "Near Toronto".

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.UrlsData.Primary
member.summary: If "true", this URL is the person's primary URL.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.UrlsData.Type
member.summary: The type of URL. Possible values are: - "home" - URL for home. - "work" - URL for work. - "blog" - URL for blog. - "profile" - URL for profile. - "other" - Other.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.Person.UrlsData.Value
member.summary: The URL value.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.PlusAclentryResource.Id
member.summary: The ID of the entry. For entries of type "person" or "circle", this is the ID of the resource. For other types, this property is not set.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.Data.PlusAclentryResource.Type
member.summary: The type of entry describing to whom access is granted. Possible values are: - "person" - Access to an individual. - "circle" - Access to members of a circle. - "myCircles" - Access to members of all the person's circles. - "extendedCircles" - Access to members of everyone in a person's circles, plus all of the people in their circles. - "public" - Access to anyone on the web.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.PlusService.Key
member.summary: Sets the API-Key (or DeveloperKey) which this service uses for all requests

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.PlusService.Scopes
member.summary: A list of all OAuth2.0 scopes. Each of these scopes relates to a permission or group of permissions that different methods of this API may need.

member.summary: Know who you are on Google

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.PlusService.Scopes.UserinfoEmail
member.summary: View your email address

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Plus.v1.ActivitiesResource.List(System.String,Google.Apis.Plus.v1.ActivitiesResource.Collection)
member.summary: List all of the activities in the specified collection for a particular user.
member.param: Required - Must match pattern me|[0-9]+ - The ID of the user to get activities for. The special value "me" can be used to indicate the authenticated user.
Required - Must be one of the following values [public] - The collection of activities to list.
